name: Lavo Life Sciences
headline: AI for drug formulation
description: Lavo Life Sciences runs simulations of drug molecules on computers. Pharma companies use these simulations to guide their experiments and ultimately save time and money in the lab. This will de-risk and expedite clinical trials and FDA approval.

# Accelerate Drug Development with Accurate Crystal Structure Prediction
De-risk your pipeline, optimize solid-state formulations, and avoid late-stage surprises with AI-powered crystal structure prediction.
[Explore Solutions](https://www.lavo.ai/</solutions>)[Book a Demo](https://www.lavo.ai/</contact>)
## Why Choose Lavo?
### Fast & Efficient
Reduce turnaround time for crystal form identification with our AI-powered solution.
### Risk Mitigation
Minimize the risk of unexpected crystal forms impacting development timelines.
### Advanced Insights
Discover novel polymorphs with improved properties using our cutting-edge technology.
## Who we are
Lavo Life Sciences provides AI-accelerated crystal structure prediction of small molecule drugs. Our team of chemists and engineers combines expertise in AI and computational chemistry to create innovative solutions for drug development teams.
[Meet Our Team ](https://www.lavo.ai/</team>)
## Benefits of Our Technology
### Optimize Formulations
Our AI-powered predictions help you optimize drug formulations for stability and manufacturability, reducing development time and costs.
### Discover Novel Polymorphs
Uncover hidden, potentially more desirable polymorphs that traditional experimental methods might miss, opening new possibilities for drug development.
### Accelerate Development
Reduce the time and resources needed for crystal form identification, allowing you to move faster through the drug development pipeline.
### Enhance Decision Making
Make more informed decisions about which drug candidates to pursue based on comprehensive crystal structure predictions and analysis.
![Lavo overlay background](https://www.lavo.ai/backgrounds/lavo-overlay.svg)
## Work with us
Let's discuss how our AI-powered crystal structure prediction can help streamline your pharmaceutical research and development process.
[Get Started Today](https://www.lavo.ai/</contact>)
[![Lavo Life Sciences Logo](https://www.lavo.ai/icons/lavo_small.svg)](https://www.lavo.ai/</>)

generated_description:
### Lavo Life Sciences: Accelerating Drug Development with AI

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Lavo Life Sciences is a trailblazer in biotechnology, specifically harnessing AI to improve drug formulation processes. The company's mission is straightforward yet ambitious—leveraging artificial intelligence to revolutionize how pharmaceutical companies formulate and test drug molecules.

At its core, Lavo uses advanced simulations to predict crystal structures of drug molecules. By running these simulations on computers, Lavo not only helps pharmaceutical companies save time and money but also significantly reduces the risks associated with clinical trials and FDA approvals. The goal? To streamline the traditionally complex and sluggish drug development pipeline.

### What They Do

Lavo specializes in AI-powered crystal structure prediction for small molecule drugs. Their technology allows organizations to:

1. **Optimize Formulations:** Their AI-driven solutions help optimize formulations for enhanced stability and manufacturability, ultimately cutting down development time and costs.
   
2. **Discover Novel Polymorphs:** The advanced predictions can identify unique polymorphs that conventional experimental methods might overlook, opening new avenues for effective drug development.

3. **Accelerate Development:** By minimizing the turnaround time for identifying crystal forms, Lavo enables faster progression through the drug development process.

4. **Enhance Decision Making:** Comprehensive analysis and crystal structure predictions empower drug developers to make better-informed decisions about which candidates to pursue.

### Why Choose Lavo?

Lavo’s approach represents a distinctive blend of chemistry and computational technology—a fusion of expert chemists and engineers dedicated to driving innovation in drug development. By focusing on risk mitigation, rapid insights, and efficiency, they offer substantial benefits that can transform drug discovery workflows. 

With an intimate team of just three, Lavo is agile and can adapt rapidly to the changing needs of their clients. Their partnership with Y Combinator adds a layer of credibility and support, further positioning them as leaders in the biotech sector.

### Connect with Lavo

If you're in the pharmaceutical industry and looking to reset your drug development clock with cutting-edge AI, Lavo Life Sciences opens the door to new possibilities. Check out their [website](https://www.lavo.ai/) for more insights, or reach out directly via contact@lavo.ai or at (650)-395-9095.

#### Social Media

Stay updated on their journey and innovations through their [LinkedIn](https://www.lavo.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/lavo-life-sciences/>) and [X (formerly Twitter)](https://www.lavo.ai/<https:/x.com/lavoAI>).

In a world where timing can make or break drug development, Lavo Life Sciences offers a promising solution—one powered by predictive analytics and a touch of AI magic. They’re not just speeding up timelines; they’re redefining the entire narrative of drug discovery.
